card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Jojojo Jokers
card.text: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may choose a Jokers creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Novalty Amaze
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures. ■ Draw a card. ■ Icon

card.name: Bainaradoor
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck. Then draw a card.

card.name: Yattareman
card.text: ■ Your Jokers cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Chotto Q
card.text: ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ■ This creature attacks your opponent each turn if able. ■ While you have 2 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker". ''(A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)''

card.name: Georges Bataille
card.text: ■ You may destroy 4 of your creatures instead of paying this creature's cost. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, count the number of cards in your graveyard. You may put the same number of cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. ■ When this creature would leave, you may put 6 cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your deck instead.

card.name: Jolly the Johnny
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Master Double Breaker ■ If you have a total of 5 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature can't be blocked, and after the attack, if your opponent has no shields and creatures, you Alternate Win

card.name: Jolly the Johnny
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Master Double Breaker ■ If you have a total of 5 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature can't be blocked, and after the attack, if your opponent has no shields and creatures, you Alternate Win

card.name: Stepple, Cherry Blossom Wind Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ When this creature is destroyed, put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard.

card.name: Dodonga Roar Cannon
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ Choose a card in the battle zone that costs 5 or less and put it into that owners graveyard. ■ Icon

card.name: Batten Oyaji
card.text: ■ Whenever a creature attacks you, you may tap this creature to stop the attack.

card.name: Burning Dead Sword
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 4 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, your opponent chooses one of their cards in the battle zone, mana zone and hand and puts them on the bottom of their deck. Then draw 3 cards.

card.name: Crysta, First Squad
card.text: ■ Your Metallica cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Zaessa, First Squad
card.text: ■ Your Mutopia cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: ChuChuris, First Squad
card.text: ■ Your Beat Jockey cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Bagin 16, First Squad
card.text: ■ Your Mafi Gang cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Lugundodo, First Squad
card.text: ■ Your Gransects cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Senno, Brainwash
card.text: ■ During your opponent's turn, they can't put creatures into the battle zone in any way except by summoning.

card.name: Time Stopon
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or less and put it on the bottom of their deck. ■ Icon

card.name: Hiraga, Shell Beast
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard a water card from your hand. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dachicco Churis
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, this turn, the next Beat Jockey you summon may cost up to 3 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Nagnag Churis
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

card.name: Rudolf Carnac
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Mafariich Tank
card.text: ■ Triple Breaker ■ This creature can't attack if you don't have other creatures in the battle zone that have power 12000 or more.

card.name: Bontobo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If it's a creature that has power 12000 or more, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Babylon Gelg
card.text: ■ Super Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Icon

card.name: Onikamas, Strange Flow
card.text: ■ Your opponent Unchoosable ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature in a way except by summoning during their turn, you may return that creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Amber, Strange Stone
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Shine Arrow
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a creature and tap it. ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Pittdel, Death Devil
card.text: ■ You may summon this creature by discarding 2 water cards instead of paying its cost. ■ Blocker

card.name: Limestay, Strange Stone
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Totenton
card.text: ■ Whenever you put a creature that has power 12000 or more into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Appo Churis
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, draw a card.

card.name: Mukade, Asura
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -9000 power until the End Step ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put it from your graveyard into the battle zone tapped.

card.name: Dope Double Boarder
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, untap it and double the power of this creature until the End Step ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may destroy one of your other creatures instead.

card.name: Shouten, Stellar Guidance
card.text: ■ Neo Evolution ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creatures attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures. ■ If this creature is tapped at the start of your opponent's turn, you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone tapped.

card.name: Bernine, Dragon Armored
card.text: ■ When you put this creature or another Metallica into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Bash, Misfortune Demon 34
card.text: ■ Slayer ■ When this creature is destroyed, put a creature that has power 1000 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Rockcrusher, Earth's Wrath
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Labyrinth: If you have more shields than your opponent, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker". ''(A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)''

card.name: Crystal Cave
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take a spell from among them, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Hemoglo, Demonic Doctor
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it. ■ When this creature is destroyed during your turn, put it into the battle zone from your graveyard at the End Step

card.name: Batch Hit
card.text: ■ This creature can only be summoned if you have 2 or less cards in your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Goron, Misfortune Demon 56
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

card.name: Deathmatch Beetle
card.text: ■ Guardman ■ This creature can't attack. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone For No Cost

card.name: Just Labyrinth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ You may tap any number of your creatures. ■ Draw a card for each of your tapped creatures.
